summary: A dark theme, mimicing the TextMate theme of the same name.
name: DevEiate-theme
description:
This is a Gvim color definition file, based loosely on Michael Granger's
eye-pleasing theme for Textmate of the same name.

Mahlon E. Smith <mahlon@martini.nu>
Michael Granger <ged@faeriemud.org>

Sample screenshot here:
http://projects.martini.nu/vim-stuff/chrome/site/deveiate.png
install_details:
Drop this into your ~/.vim/colors directory, then load it via 

:colorscheme deveiate

versions.release_notes: Minor color tweaks to increase visibility.  Designed with guicursor=a:hor1 in mind.
